titles.title: To modify the boundary of Hot Springs National Park.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E630-631)
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committee.name: House Committee on Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

committee.name: House Committee on Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 103-144.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 79.

action.text: Mr. Vento moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported in lieu of S. 752 without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 103-97.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 142.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

bill.summary: 3/16/1993--Introduced. Modifies the boundary of Hot Springs National Park.
